name: Josh's way home
description:
A short game made for the Mini game jam. I could upload the game properly as I have Gamemaker studio 2 free version so I only uploaded the source code. Here's a link if you want to play it in your browser but you will need opera Gx to play it: https://gxc.gg/games/0532c211-ab9b-4cf6-9ddd-d6e2880f0ea4

Enjoy!
